items.title: Keep Tom Happy
items.text:
The first of Tom's requirements is satisfaction and there is a lot of approaches to keep him cheerful.
 The principal ones are in the front yard, which is gotten to by tapping the smiley face button.
 Here you can play small games or play with toys, the two of which increment Tom's bliss.
 The other two different ways should be possible in any room. Take a stab at petting him by scouring your finger gradually on his stomach.
 Or then again take a stab at getting him by holding your finger on him then, at that point, moving it moving around.

items.title: Feed Tom
items.text:
The more you play with Tom, the hungrier he gets.
 Tap on the fork and blade button to go to the kitchen. Here you'll discover any food you have currently on the table.
 Tap it or drag it to Tom's mouth to take care of him.
 If you need to purchase food, then, at that point, tap on the green in addition to the sign or the refrigerator. For the most part,
 the less expensive food offers the best worth (for example four carrots will top Tom off significantly better compared to one piece of cheddar at a similar cost).
 You can open more food varieties by thinking that they are in chests (to a greater degree toward that later). Furthermore, on the off chance that you enjoy taking care of Tom,
 you can take care of him a Hungry Potion (likewise found in the cooler), which purges his yearning meter.

items.title: Deal with Tom's Health
items.text:
Once you've taken care of Tom, he'll most likely have to utilize the restroom, so tap on the shower button to take him there.
 You can get him and put him on the latrine or simply tap on it. He'll wrap up without anyone else. In case it's each of the little 'an excess of data' 
 you can tap on the way to give him some protection.
 Next, we suggest showering Tom. There are a variety of cleansers to browse, and you can use as numerous as you can imagine in one shower 
 (have a go at washing the pet, see what occurs). At long last, you may see Tom at times gets a booboo.
 Post for a green cross on the shower button, just as symptoms like a runny nose or hiccups.
 To fix a booboo, tap on the medication bureau and drag one of the fixes to Tom. Most booboos can be relieved in more than one manner, so explore.

items.title: Ensure Tom Gets Enough Sleep
items.text:
After a bustling day of playing, eating, and crapping with really Herculean exertion, Tom will undoubtedly get all exhausted.
 Tap on the moon and stars button then, at that point, get Tom and placed him in bed. Remember to tap the light to wind down the lights.
 Tom can't lay down with the lights on.
 Come back in a couple of hours and Tom will be all set once more. If you can hardly wait, you can take care of him an energy elixir,
 which is accessible for coins or as a trade-off for watching a video. Another tip: we prescribe taking care of Tom at whatever point you quit playing,
 regardless of whether he's not excessively drained. Else, he'll presumably be completely exhausted when you next restart the game.

items.title: Get Flight Tokens in Mini-Games
items.text:
Flight Tokens are significant money in Tom 2. They fuel Tom's plane and you need the plane to discover and open new bits of food,
  dress, furnishings, and pets. The most ideal approach to get Flight Tokens is generally by playing smaller than expected games. 
 Generally, the small-scale games reward more Flight Tokens the further you progress, so play whichever one you're best at.
 For instance, in case you're cutthroat and acceptable at getting Flight Tokens before different players, play Space Trails.
 Though if you lean toward a more cautious, timing-based insight, you'll presumably get additional Flight Tokens from Super Balloons or Cupid Tom.

items.title: You Get a Lot of Flight Tokens When You Level Up
items.text:
The one time when small scale games aren't the most ideal approach to get Flight Tokens is the point at which you're near step up 
 (for example at the point when the green circle around the level pointer is practically full). All things considered, acquire some XP by keeping an eye on one of Tom's requirements, 
 what's more, when you level up you'll normally get sufficient Flight Tokens for something like one flight.

items.title: Tom Doesn't Have to Grow Up
items.text:
Tom's so unbelievably charming when he's a child, that you wind up wishing he wouldn't grow up. Relax, there's an answer.
 Simply purchase a Baby Potion from the cooler and feed it to Tom. You'll keep all your step up progress, however, Tom will psychologist to child size.

items.title: Spend Your Stars Wisely
items.text:
Stars are money that you can discover in chests. Additionally, any copy things you discover will automatically be changed over into stars.
 You would then be able to spend your stars to open anything, even things from universes you haven't opened at this point. We suggest setting aside a ton for uncommon things,
 or on the other hand, purchasing less expensive things from the more significant level universes. Try not to squander Stars on modest things from the Adventure Island world,
 as you're probably going to think that they are in chests almost immediately at any rate.

items.title: Look at Your Car Collection
items.text:
Tap on the bunch of cards on the ground on the terrace to open the Collection screen.
 Here you can peruse every one of the unlockable things in the game, advantageously organized into sets.
 Tap the See Now button to discover what each set will resemble when it's finished. On the off chance that you detect a thing you like,
 hold traveling to that world, or probably set aside enough Stars to get it.

items.title: Customize Everything!
items.text:
In Talking Tom 2, a large portion of the fun is in opening new things and giving them a shot on Tom and his home.
 You can attempt to gather sets assuming you need, yet stirring up the various subjects is fun as well.
 Assuming you need a privateer transport in your lawn made of treats, then, at that point, let it all out! Did you realize you can even change the shade of Tom's pet?
 Have a go at taking care of it some brilliantly shaded food and see what occurs…
